mapper.select: select id, ci_id as ciId, name, rule as ruleStr, cron, type, is_active as isActive from cmdb_legalvalid where id = #{value}
mapper.update: update cmdb_legalvalid set name = #{name}, rule = #{ruleStr,typeHandler=CompressHandler}, cron = #{cron}, type = #{type}, is_active = #{isActive} where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into cmdb_legalvalid (id, ci_id, name, rule, cron, type, is_active) values (#{id}, #{ciId}, #{name}, #{ruleStr,typeHandler=CompressHandler}, #{cron}, #{type}, #{isActive})
mapper.delete: delete a,cci from cmdb_legalvalid a left join cmdb_cientity_illegal cci on a.id = cci.legalvalid_id where a.id = #{value}
